original_text: Peter and the angel walked past the first group of soldiers in the prison. Then they walked past the second group of soldiers. After that, they came to the big metal gate in the wall of the prison. The city was outside this gate. The gate opened by itself in front of them. So Peter and the angel went out of the prison through the gate. They walked together along one street and then, suddenly, the angel went away.
korean_text: 이에 첫째와 둘째 파수를 지나 시내로 통한 쇠문에 이르니 문이 저절로 열리는지라 나와서 한 거리를 지나매 천사가 곧 떠나더라

sentences.original_text: Peter and the angel walked past the first group of soldiers
sentences.korean_translation: 베드로와 천사가 첫 번째 경비병 그룹을 지나갔습니다

sentences.original_text: Then they walked past the second group of soldiers
sentences.korean_translation: 그 다음 그들은 두 번째 경비병 그룹을 지나갔습니다

sentences.original_text: After that, they came to the big metal gate
sentences.korean_translation: 그 후에 그들은 큰 철문에 도착했습니다

sentences.original_text: in the wall of the prison
The city was outside this gate
So Peter and the angel went out of the prison
They walked together along one street
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 함께 거리 한 쪽을 따라 걸었습니다
